title: NOVA Neck, Back & Under Leg Roll Pillow, Travel Cervical Bolster Pillow, Soft Fleece Cover is Removable & Washable
features: MULTI-USE ROUND ROLL PILLOW is designed to use under the neck, the lower back, under the legs or in any position to provide support and comfort
CHOOSE THE LOOK AND FEEL - comes in Sheepskin Fleece, Sky Blue Satin and Soft Classic White
GREAT FOR TRAVEL. The round and compact shape make this an ideal plane, car and travel pillow. Pillow Size: 18"W x 7"D x 7"H
COMFY PILLOW is 100% hypoallergenic polyester fiberfill
SOFT & DURABLE COVER is zipper removable and washable
description: The average American spends 8 hours a day sleeping and that average tends to increase as we age and certainly does when we are in need of more rest in recovery. Having the right size and shaped cushion can give your body the perfect support or angle so your body can rest and you can sleep.
